title: Friender
description: A web app app to  find like-minded people near you. After making an account and building a profile, users are able to explore, match, and chat with other uses within their selected geographic search radius.
notes: To best experience demo, use demo account provided on homepage, or create a new user with zipcode set to 10001 and a radius of 10 or greater.

title: Wordle
description: I love Wordle, so I made it. Can use machine keyboard or UI keyboard buttons to play. Game record stored in local storage.
